bosses.name: Dr. Blunder
bosses.description: Dr. Blunder is the polite, bumbling alter ego of the horrible Mr Mate. When Dr. Blunder’s circuits overload, Mr. Mate emerges leading to devastating checkmates.
bosses.weakness: Try out some powerups to gain an extra advantage
taunts: Oh dear, did I just hang a piece? Or was that part of my master plan?
I may be glitching, but at least I'm not predictable!
Calculating... calculating... oh bother, let’s just wing it!

cutscene.text: Oh dear… something… feels… wrong. My circuits... are... glitching...!

bosses.attack: ??? My logic processing unit is malfunctioning ??? Selecting move at random ???

bosses.engine: No fair, I'm the only engine around here!

bosses.name: Mr. Mate
bosses.description: Mr. Mate is the aggressive, chaotic alter ego of Dr. Blunder. Mr. Mate is a tactical genius, just as long as he stays transformed.
taunts: ME MR. MATE! YOUR KING WILL FALL IN THREE MOVES—OR LESS!
NO MORE POLITE! ONLY PAIN! CHECKMATE IS COMING!
YOU THINK YOU CAN WIN? I’LL CRUSH YOU LIKE A BUG!

bosses.name: Illusion.exe
bosses.description: A cursed chess engine, corrupted by unseen forces. Illusion.exe manipulates perception, making pieces appear and disappear at will. Can you trust your memory, or will you fall victim to its tricks?
bosses.weakness: The undo powerup can undo its powerful spell
taunts: Are you sure that piece was there?

cutscene.title: A new presence emerges...
cutscene.text: I have waited in the shadows... for my next opponent.

cutscene.title: Your vision deceives you...
cutscene.text: Not all pieces are seen... but they are always there.

cutscene.title: The board shifts...
cutscene.text: Do you remember where they are? Ha ha haa...

bosses.undo: Your frail mind clings to the past...
